summary: App includes multi-stage character questionnaires; add support for creating bands/groups with a dedicated questionnaire and larger member counts.

existing_features.title:
Replace the current freeform “Create Band/Group” flow with a dedicated Band/Group questionnaire flow that is separate from the existing single-character questionnaire and the family questionnaire.

The Band/Group flow must:
- Ask at least one band/group-level setup section (e.g., group name and basic concept) and then run a per-member questionnaire section.
- Produce the same final output as today: create multiple Characters in the selected project (name, background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, storyRole).
- Keep user-facing text in English.

Increase the Band/Group member count selection limit to support large groups beyond 7 members.

Update the Band/Group member-count UI to allow a configurable maximum of at least 45 members, and ensure the flow remains usable at that size (basic validation and navigation still work).

Add a backend batch API to create multiple characters in one call, and update the frontend Band/Group creation to use it.

The batch API must:
- Accept a projectId and an array of characters (name, background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, storyRole).
- Enforce project access control consistent with existing project mutation methods.
- Create all characters in the project within the single call.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a dedicated questionnaire flow for creating a Band/Group (separate from character questionnaire).
Increase Band/Group member selection limit beyond 7 (support larger groups, e.g., 17–45).

projectName: Add dedicated Band/Group questionnaire and increase member count limit
